effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Power is determined by the PP remaining for this move, after its PP cost is deducted. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. PP remaining | Power ------------ | ----: 4 or more | 40 3 | 50 2 | 60 1 | 80 0 | 200 If this move is activated by another move, the activating move’s PP is used to calculate power.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Power increases when this move has less PP, up to a maximum of 200.
